63 Object::Object() : m_PackGUID(sizeof(uint64) + 1)
64 {
65  m_objectTypeId = TYPEID_OBJECT;
66  m_objectType = TYPEMASK_OBJECT;
67 
68  m_uint32Values = nullptr;
69  m_valuesCount = 0;
70  _fieldNotifyFlags = UF_FLAG_DYNAMIC;
71 
72  m_inWorld = false;
73  m_objectUpdated = false;
74 
75  sScriptMgr->OnConstructObject(this);
76 }
77 
78 WorldObject::~WorldObject()
79 {
80 #ifdef ELUNA
81  delete elunaEvents;
82  elunaEvents = nullptr;
83 #endif
84 
85  // this may happen because there are many !create/delete
86  if (IsWorldObject() && m_currMap)
87  {
88  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_CORPSE)
89  {
90  LOG_FATAL("entities.object", "Object::~Object Corpse %s, type=%d deleted but still in map!!", GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), ((Corpse*)this)->GetType());
91  ABORT();
92  }
93  ResetMap();
94  }
95 }
96 
97 Object::~Object()
98 {
99  sScriptMgr->OnDestructObject(this);
100 
101  if (IsInWorld())
102  {
103  LOG_FATAL("entities.object", "Object::~Object - %s deleted but still in world!!", GetGUID().ToString().c_str());
104  if (isType(TYPEMASK_ITEM))
105  LOG_FATAL("entities.object", "Item slot %u", ((Item*)this)->GetSlot());
106  ABORT();
107  }
108 
109  if (m_objectUpdated)
110  {
111  LOG_FATAL("entities.object", "Object::~Object - %s deleted but still in update list!!", GetGUID().ToString().c_str());
112  ABORT();
113  }
114 
115  delete [] m_uint32Values;
116  m_uint32Values = 0;
117 }
118 
119 void Object::_InitValues()
120 {
121  m_uint32Values = new uint32[m_valuesCount];
122  memset(m_uint32Values, 0, m_valuesCount * sizeof(uint32));
123 
124  _changesMask.SetCount(m_valuesCount);
125 
126  m_objectUpdated = false;
127 }
128 
129 void Object::_Create(ObjectGuid::LowType guidlow, uint32 entry, HighGuid guidhigh)
130 {
131  if (!m_uint32Values) _InitValues();
132 
133  ObjectGuid guid(guidhigh, entry, guidlow);
134  SetGuidValue(OBJECT_FIELD_GUID, guid);
135  SetUInt32Value(OBJECT_FIELD_TYPE, m_objectType);
136  m_PackGUID.Set(guid);
137 }

139 std::string Object::_ConcatFields(uint16 startIndex, uint16 size) const
140 {
141  std::ostringstream ss;
142  for (uint16 index = 0; index < size; ++index)
143  ss << GetUInt32Value(index + startIndex) << ' ';
144  return ss.str();
145 }

147 void Object::AddToWorld()
148 {
149  if (m_inWorld)
150  return;
151 
152  ASSERT(m_uint32Values);
153 
154  m_inWorld = true;
155 
156  // synchronize values mirror with values array (changes will send in updatecreate opcode any way
157  ASSERT(!m_objectUpdated);
158  ClearUpdateMask(false);
159 }

161 void Object::RemoveFromWorld()
162 {
163  if (!m_inWorld)
164  return;
165 
166  m_inWorld = false;
167 
168  // if we remove from world then sending changes not required
169  ClearUpdateMask(true);
170 }

172 void Object::BuildMovementUpdateBlock(UpdateData* data, uint32 flags) const
173 {
174  ByteBuffer buf(500);
175 
176  buf << uint8(UPDATETYPE_MOVEMENT);
177  buf << GetPackGUID();
178 
179  BuildMovementUpdate(&buf, flags);
180 
181  data->AddUpdateBlock(buf);
182 }
183 
184 void Object::BuildCreateUpdateBlockForPlayer(UpdateData* data, Player* target) const
185 {
186  if (!target)
187  return;
188 
189  uint8 updatetype = UPDATETYPE_CREATE_OBJECT;
190  uint16 flags = m_updateFlag;
191 
193  if (target == this) // building packet for yourself
194  flags |= UPDATEFLAG_SELF;
195 
196  if (flags & UPDATEFLAG_STATIONARY_POSITION)
197  {
198  // UPDATETYPE_CREATE_OBJECT2 dynamic objects, corpses...
199  if (isType(TYPEMASK_DYNAMICOBJECT) || isType(TYPEMASK_CORPSE) || isType(TYPEMASK_PLAYER))
200  updatetype = UPDATETYPE_CREATE_OBJECT2;
201 
202  // UPDATETYPE_CREATE_OBJECT2 for pets...
203  if (target->GetPetGUID() == GetGUID())
204  updatetype = UPDATETYPE_CREATE_OBJECT2;
205 
206  // UPDATETYPE_CREATE_OBJECT2 for some gameobject types...
207  if (isType(TYPEMASK_GAMEOBJECT))
208  {
209  switch (((GameObject*)this)->GetGoType())
210  {
211  case GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_TRAP:
212  case GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_DUEL_ARBITER:
213  case GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_FLAGSTAND:
214  case GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_FLAGDROP:
215  updatetype = UPDATETYPE_CREATE_OBJECT2;
216  break;
217  default:
218  if (((GameObject*)this)->GetOwner())
219  updatetype = UPDATETYPE_CREATE_OBJECT2;
220  break;
221  }
222  }
223 
224  if (isType(TYPEMASK_UNIT))
225  {
226  if (((Unit*)this)->GetVictim())
227  flags |= UPDATEFLAG_HAS_TARGET;
228  }
229  }
230 
231  ByteBuffer buf(500);
232  buf << (uint8)updatetype;
233  buf << GetPackGUID();
234  buf << (uint8)m_objectTypeId;
235 
236  BuildMovementUpdate(&buf, flags);
237  BuildValuesUpdate(updatetype, &buf, target);
238  data->AddUpdateBlock(buf);
239 }
240 
241 void Object::SendUpdateToPlayer(Player* player)
242 {
243  // send create update to player
244  UpdateData upd;
245  WorldPacket packet;
246 
247  BuildCreateUpdateBlockForPlayer(&upd, player);
248  upd.BuildPacket(&packet);
249  player->GetSession()->SendPacket(&packet);
250 }

269 void Object::DestroyForPlayer(Player* target, bool onDeath) const
270 {
271  ASSERT(target);
272 
273  if (isType(TYPEMASK_UNIT) || isType(TYPEMASK_PLAYER))
274  {
275  if (Battleground* bg = target->GetBattleground())
276  {
277  if (bg->isArena())
278  {
279  WorldPacket data(SMSG_ARENA_UNIT_DESTROYED, 8);
280  data << GetGUID();
281  target->GetSession()->SendPacket(&data);
282  }
283  }
284  }
285 
286  WorldPacket data(SMSG_DESTROY_OBJECT, 8 + 1);
287  data << GetGUID();
290  data << uint8(onDeath ? 1 : 0);
291  target->GetSession()->SendPacket(&data);
292 }

338 void Object::BuildMovementUpdate(ByteBuffer* data, uint16 flags) const
339 {
340  Unit const* unit = nullptr;
341  WorldObject const* object = nullptr;
342 
343  if (isType(TYPEMASK_UNIT))
344  unit = ToUnit();
345  else
346  object = ((WorldObject*)this);
347 
348  *data << uint16(flags); // update flags
349 
350  // 0x20
351  if (flags & UPDATEFLAG_LIVING)
352  {
353  unit->BuildMovementPacket(data);
354 
355  *data << unit->GetSpeed(MOVE_WALK)
356  << unit->GetSpeed(MOVE_RUN)
357  << unit->GetSpeed(MOVE_RUN_BACK)
358  << unit->GetSpeed(MOVE_SWIM)
359  << unit->GetSpeed(MOVE_SWIM_BACK)
360  << unit->GetSpeed(MOVE_FLIGHT)
361  << unit->GetSpeed(MOVE_FLIGHT_BACK)
362  << unit->GetSpeed(MOVE_TURN_RATE)
363  << unit->GetSpeed(MOVE_PITCH_RATE);
364 
365  // 0x08000000
366  if (unit->m_movementInfo.GetMovementFlags() & MOVEMENTFLAG_SPLINE_ENABLED)
367  {
368  const G3D::Vector3* p = &unit->movespline->_Spline().getPoints(true)[0];
369  if (unit->movespline->_Spline().getPoints(true).empty() || (!unit->movespline->_Spline().getPoints(true).empty() && !p))
370  const_cast<Unit*>(unit)->DisableSpline();
371  else
372  Movement::PacketBuilder::WriteCreate(*unit->movespline, *data);
373  }
374  }
375  else
376  {
377  if (flags & UPDATEFLAG_POSITION)
378  {
379  Transport* transport = object->GetTransport();
380 
381  if (transport)
382  *data << transport->GetPackGUID();
383  else
384  *data << uint8(0);
385 
386  *data << object->GetPositionX();
387  *data << object->GetPositionY();
388  *data << object->GetPositionZ();
389 
390  if (transport)
391  {
392  *data << object->GetTransOffsetX();
393  *data << object->GetTransOffsetY();
394  *data << object->GetTransOffsetZ();
395  }
396  else
397  {
398  *data << object->GetPositionX();
399  *data << object->GetPositionY();
400  *data << object->GetPositionZ();
401  }
402 
403  *data << object->GetOrientation();
404 
405  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_CORPSE)
406  *data << float(object->GetOrientation());
407  else
408  *data << float(0);
409  }
410  else
411  {
412  // 0x40
413  if (flags & UPDATEFLAG_STATIONARY_POSITION)
414  {
415  *data << object->GetStationaryX();
416  *data << object->GetStationaryY();
417  *data << object->GetStationaryZ();
418  *data << object->GetStationaryO();
419  }
420  }
421  }
422 
423  // 0x8
424  if (flags & UPDATEFLAG_UNKNOWN)
425  {
426  *data << uint32(0);
427  }
428 
429  // 0x10
430  if (flags & UPDATEFLAG_LOWGUID)
431  {
432  switch (GetTypeId())
433  {
434  case TYPEID_OBJECT:
435  case TYPEID_ITEM:
436  case TYPEID_CONTAINER:
437  case TYPEID_GAMEOBJECT:
438  case TYPEID_DYNAMICOBJECT:
439  case TYPEID_CORPSE:
440  *data << uint32(GetGUID().GetCounter());
441  break;
444  case TYPEID_UNIT:
445  *data << uint32(0x0000000B); // unk
446  break;
447  case TYPEID_PLAYER:
448  if (flags & UPDATEFLAG_SELF)
449  *data << uint32(0x0000002F); // unk
450  else
451  *data << uint32(0x00000008); // unk
452  break;
453  default:
454  *data << uint32(0x00000000); // unk
455  break;
456  }
457  }
458 
459  // 0x4
460  if (flags & UPDATEFLAG_HAS_TARGET)
461  {
462  if (Unit* victim = unit->GetVictim())
463  *data << victim->GetPackGUID();
464  else
465  *data << uint8(0);
466  }
467 
468  // 0x2
469  if (flags & UPDATEFLAG_TRANSPORT)
470  {
471  GameObject const* go = ToGameObject();
472  if (go && go->ToTransport())
473  *data << uint32(go->ToTransport()->GetPathProgress());
474  else
475  *data << uint32(0);
476  }
477 
478  // 0x80
479  if (flags & UPDATEFLAG_VEHICLE)
480  {
482  *data << uint32(unit->GetVehicleKit()->GetVehicleInfo()->m_ID);
483  if (unit->HasUnitMovementFlag(MOVEMENTFLAG_ONTRANSPORT))
484  *data << float(unit->GetTransOffsetO());
485  else
486  *data << float(unit->GetOrientation());
487  }
488 
489  // 0x200
490  if (flags & UPDATEFLAG_ROTATION)
491  {
492  *data << int64(ToGameObject()->GetPackedLocalRotation());
493  }
494 }
495 
496 void Object::BuildValuesUpdate(uint8 updateType, ByteBuffer* data, Player* target) const
497 {
498  if (!target)
499  return;
500 
501  ByteBuffer fieldBuffer;
502  UpdateMask updateMask;
503  updateMask.SetCount(m_valuesCount);
504 
505  uint32* flags = nullptr;
506  uint32 visibleFlag = GetUpdateFieldData(target, flags);
507 
508  for (uint16 index = 0; index < m_valuesCount; ++index)
509  {
510  if (_fieldNotifyFlags & flags[index] ||
511  ((updateType == UPDATETYPE_VALUES ? _changesMask.GetBit(index) : m_uint32Values[index]) && (flags[index] & visibleFlag)))
512  {
513  updateMask.SetBit(index);
514  fieldBuffer << m_uint32Values[index];
515  }
516  }
517 
518  *data << uint8(updateMask.GetBlockCount());
519  updateMask.AppendToPacket(data);
520  data->append(fieldBuffer);
521 }
522 
523 void Object::AddToObjectUpdateIfNeeded()
524 {
525  if (m_inWorld && !m_objectUpdated)
526  {
527  AddToObjectUpdate();
528  m_objectUpdated = true;
529  }
530 }

532 void Object::ClearUpdateMask(bool remove)
533 {
534  _changesMask.Clear();
535 
536  if (m_objectUpdated)
537  {
538  if (remove)
539  RemoveFromObjectUpdate();
540  m_objectUpdated = false;
541  }
542 }

544 void Object::BuildFieldsUpdate(Player* player, UpdateDataMapType& data_map) const
545 {
546  UpdateDataMapType::iterator iter = data_map.find(player);
547 
548  if (iter == data_map.end())
549  {
550  std::pair<UpdateDataMapType::iterator, bool> p = data_map.insert(UpdateDataMapType::value_type(player, UpdateData()));
551  ASSERT(p.second);
552  iter = p.first;
553  }
554 
555  BuildValuesUpdateBlockForPlayer(&iter->second, iter->first);
556 }
557 
558 uint32 Object::GetUpdateFieldData(Player const* target, uint32*& flags) const
559 {
560  uint32 visibleFlag = UF_FLAG_PUBLIC;
561 
562  if (target == this)
563  visibleFlag |= UF_FLAG_PRIVATE;
564 
565  switch (GetTypeId())
566  {
567  case TYPEID_ITEM:
568  case TYPEID_CONTAINER:
569  flags = ItemUpdateFieldFlags;
570  if (((Item*)this)->GetOwnerGUID() == target->GetGUID())
571  visibleFlag |= UF_FLAG_OWNER | UF_FLAG_ITEM_OWNER;
572  break;
573  case TYPEID_UNIT:
574  case TYPEID_PLAYER:
575  {
576  Player* plr = ToUnit()->GetCharmerOrOwnerPlayerOrPlayerItself();
577  flags = UnitUpdateFieldFlags;
578  if (ToUnit()->GetOwnerGUID() == target->GetGUID())
579  visibleFlag |= UF_FLAG_OWNER;
580 
581  if (HasFlag(UNIT_DYNAMIC_FLAGS, UNIT_DYNFLAG_SPECIALINFO))
582  if (ToUnit()->HasAuraTypeWithCaster(SPELL_AURA_EMPATHY, target->GetGUID()))
583  visibleFlag |= UF_FLAG_SPECIAL_INFO;
584 
585  if (plr && plr->IsInSameRaidWith(target))
586  visibleFlag |= UF_FLAG_PARTY_MEMBER;
587  break;
588  }
589  case TYPEID_GAMEOBJECT:
590  flags = GameObjectUpdateFieldFlags;
591  if (ToGameObject()->GetOwnerGUID() == target->GetGUID())
592  visibleFlag |= UF_FLAG_OWNER;
593  break;
594  case TYPEID_DYNAMICOBJECT:
595  flags = DynamicObjectUpdateFieldFlags;
596  if (((DynamicObject*)this)->GetCasterGUID() == target->GetGUID())
597  visibleFlag |= UF_FLAG_OWNER;
598  break;
599  case TYPEID_CORPSE:
600  flags = CorpseUpdateFieldFlags;
601  if (ToCorpse()->GetOwnerGUID() == target->GetGUID())
602  visibleFlag |= UF_FLAG_OWNER;
603  break;
604  case TYPEID_OBJECT:
605  break;
606  }
607 
608  return visibleFlag;
609 }
610 
611 void Object::_LoadIntoDataField(std::string const& data, uint32 startOffset, uint32 count)
612 {
613  if (data.empty())
614  return;
615 
616  Tokenizer tokens(data, ' ', count);
617 
618  if (tokens.size() != count)
619  return;
620 
621  for (uint32 index = 0; index < count; ++index)
622  {
623  m_uint32Values[startOffset + index] = atol(tokens[index]);
624  _changesMask.SetBit(startOffset + index);
625  }
626 }

638  }

662 void Object::SetUInt64Value(uint16 index, uint64 value)
663 {
664  ASSERT(index + 1 < m_valuesCount || PrintIndexError(index, true));
665 
666  if (*((uint64*) & (m_uint32Values[index])) != value)
667  {
668  m_uint32Values[index] = PAIR64_LOPART(value);
669  m_uint32Values[index + 1] = PAIR64_HIPART(value);
670  _changesMask.SetBit(index);
671  _changesMask.SetBit(index + 1);
672 
673  AddToObjectUpdateIfNeeded();
674  }
675 }
676 
677 bool Object::AddGuidValue(uint16 index, ObjectGuid value)
678 {
679  ASSERT(index + 1 < m_valuesCount || PrintIndexError(index, true));
680 
681  if (value && !*((ObjectGuid*)&(m_uint32Values[index])))
682  {
683  *((ObjectGuid*)&(m_uint32Values[index])) = value;
684  _changesMask.SetBit(index);
685  _changesMask.SetBit(index + 1);
686 
687  AddToObjectUpdateIfNeeded();
688 
689  return true;
690  }
691 
692  return false;
693 }
694 
695 bool Object::RemoveGuidValue(uint16 index, ObjectGuid value)
696 {
697  ASSERT(index + 1 < m_valuesCount || PrintIndexError(index, true));
698 
699  if (value && *((ObjectGuid*)&(m_uint32Values[index])) == value)
700  {
701  m_uint32Values[index] = 0;
702  m_uint32Values[index + 1] = 0;
703  _changesMask.SetBit(index);
704  _changesMask.SetBit(index + 1);
705 
706  AddToObjectUpdateIfNeeded();
707 
708  return true;
709  }
710 
711  return false;
712 }

741 void Object::SetByteValue(uint16 index, uint8 offset, uint8 value)
742 {
743  ASSERT(index < m_valuesCount || PrintIndexError(index, true));
744 
745  if (offset > 3)
746  {
747  LOG_ERROR("entities.object", "Object::SetByteValue: wrong offset %u", offset);
748  return;
749  }
750 
751  if (uint8(m_uint32Values[index] >> (offset * 8)) != value)
752  {
753  m_uint32Values[index] &= ~uint32(uint32(0xFF) << (offset * 8));
754  m_uint32Values[index] |= uint32(uint32(value) << (offset * 8));
755  _changesMask.SetBit(index);
756 
757  AddToObjectUpdateIfNeeded();
758  }
759 }
760 
761 void Object::SetUInt16Value(uint16 index, uint8 offset, uint16 value)
762 {
763  ASSERT(index < m_valuesCount || PrintIndexError(index, true));
764 
765  if (offset > 1)
766  {
767  LOG_ERROR("entities.object", "Object::SetUInt16Value: wrong offset %u", offset);
768  return;
769  }
770 
771  if (uint16(m_uint32Values[index] >> (offset * 16)) != value)
772  {
773  m_uint32Values[index] &= ~uint32(uint32(0xFFFF) << (offset * 16));
774  m_uint32Values[index] |= uint32(uint32(value) << (offset * 16));
775  _changesMask.SetBit(index);
776 
777  AddToObjectUpdateIfNeeded();
778  }
779 }
780 
781 void Object::SetStatFloatValue(uint16 index, float value)
782 {
783  if (value < 0)
784  value = 0.0f;
785 
786  SetFloatValue(index, value);

836 void Object::SetFlag(uint16 index, uint32 newFlag)
837 {
838  ASSERT(index < m_valuesCount || PrintIndexError(index, true));
839  uint32 oldval = m_uint32Values[index];
840  uint32 newval = oldval | newFlag;
841 
842  if (oldval != newval)
843  {
844  m_uint32Values[index] = newval;
845  _changesMask.SetBit(index);
846 
847  AddToObjectUpdateIfNeeded();
848  }
849 }
850 
851 void Object::RemoveFlag(uint16 index, uint32 oldFlag)
852 {
853  ASSERT(index < m_valuesCount || PrintIndexError(index, true));
854  ASSERT(m_uint32Values);
855 
856  uint32 oldval = m_uint32Values[index];
857  uint32 newval = oldval & ~oldFlag;
858 
859  if (oldval != newval)
860  {
861  m_uint32Values[index] = newval;
862  _changesMask.SetBit(index);
863 
864  AddToObjectUpdateIfNeeded();
865  }
866 }
867 
868 void Object::ToggleFlag(uint16 index, uint32 flag)
869 {
870  if (HasFlag(index, flag))
871  {
872  RemoveFlag(index, flag);
873  }
874  else
875  {
876  SetFlag(index, flag);
877  }
878 }
879 
880 [[nodiscard]] bool Object::HasFlag(uint16 index, uint32 flag) const
881 {
882  if (index >= m_valuesCount && !PrintIndexError(index, false))
883  {
884  return false;
885  }
886 
887  return (m_uint32Values[index] & flag) != 0;
888 }

902 void Object::SetByteFlag(uint16 index, uint8 offset, uint8 newFlag)
903 {
904  ASSERT(index < m_valuesCount || PrintIndexError(index, true));
905 
906  if (offset > 3)
907  {
908  LOG_ERROR("entities.object", "Object::SetByteFlag: wrong offset %u", offset);
909  return;
910  }
911 
912  if (!(uint8(m_uint32Values[index] >> (offset * 8)) & newFlag))
913  {
914  m_uint32Values[index] |= uint32(uint32(newFlag) << (offset * 8));
915  _changesMask.SetBit(index);
916 
917  AddToObjectUpdateIfNeeded();
918  }
919 }

921 void Object::RemoveByteFlag(uint16 index, uint8 offset, uint8 oldFlag)

925  if (offset > 3)
926  {

928  return;
929  }
930 
931  if (uint8(m_uint32Values[index] >> (offset * 8)) & oldFlag)
932  {
933  m_uint32Values[index] &= ~uint32(uint32(oldFlag) << (offset * 8));
934  _changesMask.SetBit(index);
935 
936  AddToObjectUpdateIfNeeded();
937  }
938 }

1008 void Position::RelocatePolarOffset(float angle, float dist, float z /*= 0.0f*/)
1009 {
1010  SetOrientation(GetOrientation() + angle);
1011 
1012  m_positionX = GetPositionX() + dist * std::cos(GetOrientation());
1013  m_positionY = GetPositionY() + dist * std::sin(GetOrientation());
1014  m_positionZ = GetPositionZ() + z;
1015 }

1017 bool Position::HasInLine(WorldObject const* target, float width) const
1018 {
1019  if (!HasInArc(M_PI, target))
1020  return false;
1021  width += target->GetObjectSize();
1022  float angle = GetRelativeAngle(target);
1023  return fabs(sin(angle)) * GetExactDist2d(target->GetPositionX(), target->GetPositionY()) < width;
1024 }

1068  LOG_INFO("movement", "flags %u", flags);

1076  LOG_INFO("movement", "guid: %s", transport.guid.ToString().c_str());

1078  LOG_INFO("movement", "seat: %i", transport.seat);
1079  LOG_INFO("movement", "time: %u", transport.time);
1080 
1081  if (flags2 & MOVEMENTFLAG2_INTERPOLATED_MOVEMENT)
1082  {
1083  LOG_INFO("movement", "time2: %u", transport.time2);
1084  }
1085  }
1086 
1087  if ((flags & (MOVEMENTFLAG_SWIMMING | MOVEMENTFLAG_FLYING)) || (flags2 & MOVEMENTFLAG2_ALWAYS_ALLOW_PITCHING))
1088  LOG_INFO("movement", "pitch: %f", pitch);
1089 
1090  LOG_INFO("movement", "fallTime: %u", fallTime);
1091  if (flags & MOVEMENTFLAG_FALLING)
1092  LOG_INFO("movement", "j_zspeed: %f j_sinAngle: %f j_cosAngle: %f j_xyspeed: %f", jump.zspeed, jump.sinAngle, jump.cosAngle, jump.xyspeed);
1093 
1094  if (flags & MOVEMENTFLAG_SPLINE_ELEVATION)
1095  LOG_INFO("movement", "splineElevation: %f", splineElevation);
1096 }

1136 void WorldObject::setActive(bool on)
1137 {
1138  if (m_isActive == on)
1139  return;
1140 
1141  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
1142  return;
1143 
1144  m_isActive = on;
1145 
1146  if (on && !IsInWorld())
1147  return;
1148 
1149  Map* map = FindMap();
1150  if (!map)
1151  return;
1152 
1153  if (on)
1154  {
1155  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
1156  map->AddToActive(this->ToCreature());
1157  else if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_DYNAMICOBJECT)
1158  map->AddToActive((DynamicObject*)this);
1159  else if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_GAMEOBJECT)
1160  map->AddToActive((GameObject*)this);
1161  }
1162  else
1163  {
1164  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
1165  map->RemoveFromActive(this->ToCreature());
1166  else if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_DYNAMICOBJECT)
1167  map->RemoveFromActive((DynamicObject*)this);
1168  else if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_GAMEOBJECT)
1169  map->RemoveFromActive((GameObject*)this);
1170  }
1171 }

1246 float WorldObject::GetDistanceZ(const WorldObject* obj) const
1247 {
1248  float dz = fabs(GetPositionZ() - obj->GetPositionZ());
1249  float sizefactor = GetObjectSize() + obj->GetObjectSize();
1250  float dist = dz - sizefactor;
1251  return (dist > 0 ? dist : 0);
1252 }
1253 
1254 bool WorldObject::_IsWithinDist(WorldObject const* obj, float dist2compare, bool is3D, bool useBoundingRadius) const
1255 {
1256  float sizefactor = useBoundingRadius ? GetObjectSize() + obj->GetObjectSize() : 0.0f;
1257  float maxdist = dist2compare + sizefactor;
1258 
1259  if (m_transport && obj->GetTransport() && obj->GetTransport()->GetGUID() == m_transport->GetGUID())
1260  {
1261  float dtx = m_movementInfo.transport.pos.m_positionX - obj->m_movementInfo.transport.pos.m_positionX;
1262  float dty = m_movementInfo.transport.pos.m_positionY - obj->m_movementInfo.transport.pos.m_positionY;
1263  float disttsq = dtx * dtx + dty * dty;
1264  if (is3D)
1265  {
1266  float dtz = m_movementInfo.transport.pos.m_positionZ - obj->m_movementInfo.transport.pos.m_positionZ;
1267  disttsq += dtz * dtz;
1268  }
1269  return disttsq < (maxdist * maxdist);
1270  }
1271 
1272  float dx = GetPositionX() - obj->GetPositionX();
1273  float dy = GetPositionY() - obj->GetPositionY();
1274  float distsq = dx * dx + dy * dy;
1275  if (is3D)
1276  {
1277  float dz = GetPositionZ() - obj->GetPositionZ();
1278  distsq += dz * dz;
1279  }
1280 
1281  return distsq < maxdist * maxdist;
1282 }
1283 
1284 Position WorldObject::GetHitSpherePointFor(Position const& dest) const
1285 {
1286  G3D::Vector3 vThis(GetPositionX(), GetPositionY(), GetPositionZ() + GetCollisionHeight());
1287  G3D::Vector3 vObj(dest.GetPositionX(), dest.GetPositionY(), dest.GetPositionZ());
1288  G3D::Vector3 contactPoint = vThis + (vObj - vThis).directionOrZero() * std::min(dest.GetExactDist(this), GetObjectSize());
1289 
1290  return Position(contactPoint.x, contactPoint.y, contactPoint.z, GetAngle(contactPoint.x, contactPoint.y));
1291 }

1297 }

1374 bool WorldObject::IsWithinLOS(float ox, float oy, float oz, LineOfSightChecks checks) const
1375 {
1376  if (IsInWorld())
1377  {
1378  oz += GetCollisionHeight();
1379  float x, y, z;
1380  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
1381  {
1382  GetPosition(x, y, z);
1383  z += GetCollisionHeight();
1384  }
1385  else
1386  {
1387  GetHitSpherePointFor({ ox, oy, oz }, x, y, z);
1388  }
1389 
1390  return GetMap()->isInLineOfSight(x, y, z, ox, oy, oz, GetPhaseMask(), checks);
1391  }
1392  return true;
1393 }
1394 
1395 bool WorldObject::IsWithinLOSInMap(const WorldObject* obj, LineOfSightChecks checks) const
1396 {
1397  if (!IsInMap(obj))
1398  return false;
1399 
1400  float ox, oy, oz;
1401  if (obj->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
1402  {
1403  obj->GetPosition(ox, oy, oz);
1404  oz += obj->GetCollisionHeight();
1405  }
1406  else
1407  obj->GetHitSpherePointFor({ GetPositionX(), GetPositionY(), GetPositionZ() + GetCollisionHeight() }, ox, oy, oz);
1408 
1409  float x, y, z;
1410  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
1411  {
1412  GetPosition(x, y, z);
1413  z += GetCollisionHeight();
1414  }
1415  else
1416  GetHitSpherePointFor({ obj->GetPositionX(), obj->GetPositionY(), obj->GetPositionZ() + obj->GetCollisionHeight() }, x, y, z);
1417 
1418  return GetMap()->isInLineOfSight(x, y, z, ox, oy, oz, GetPhaseMask(), checks);
1419 }
1420 
1421 void WorldObject::GetHitSpherePointFor(Position const& dest, float& x, float& y, float& z) const
1422 {
1423  Position pos = GetHitSpherePointFor(dest);
1424  x = pos.GetPositionX();
1425  y = pos.GetPositionY();
1426  z = pos.GetPositionZ();
1427 }

1429 bool WorldObject::GetDistanceOrder(WorldObject const* obj1, WorldObject const* obj2, bool is3D /* = true */) const
1430 {
1431  float dx1 = GetPositionX() - obj1->GetPositionX();
1432  float dy1 = GetPositionY() - obj1->GetPositionY();
1433  float distsq1 = dx1 * dx1 + dy1 * dy1;
1434  if (is3D)
1435  {
1436  float dz1 = GetPositionZ() - obj1->GetPositionZ();
1437  distsq1 += dz1 * dz1;
1438  }
1439 
1440  float dx2 = GetPositionX() - obj2->GetPositionX();
1441  float dy2 = GetPositionY() - obj2->GetPositionY();
1442  float distsq2 = dx2 * dx2 + dy2 * dy2;
1443  if (is3D)
1444  {
1445  float dz2 = GetPositionZ() - obj2->GetPositionZ();
1446  distsq2 += dz2 * dz2;
1447  }
1448 
1449  return distsq1 < distsq2;
1450 }
1451 
1452 bool WorldObject::IsInRange(WorldObject const* obj, float minRange, float maxRange, bool is3D /* = true */) const
1453 {
1454  float dx = GetPositionX() - obj->GetPositionX();
1455  float dy = GetPositionY() - obj->GetPositionY();
1456  float distsq = dx * dx + dy * dy;
1457  if (is3D)
1458  {
1459  float dz = GetPositionZ() - obj->GetPositionZ();
1460  distsq += dz * dz;
1461  }
1462 
1463  float sizefactor = GetObjectSize() + obj->GetObjectSize();
1464 
1465  // check only for real range
1466  if (minRange > 0.0f)
1467  {
1468  float mindist = minRange + sizefactor;
1469  if (distsq < mindist * mindist)
1470  return false;
1471  }
1472 
1473  float maxdist = maxRange + sizefactor;
1474  return distsq < maxdist * maxdist;
1475 }
1476 
1477 bool WorldObject::IsInRange2d(float x, float y, float minRange, float maxRange) const
1478 {
1479  float dx = GetPositionX() - x;
1480  float dy = GetPositionY() - y;
1481  float distsq = dx * dx + dy * dy;
1482 
1483  float sizefactor = GetObjectSize();
1484 
1485  // check only for real range
1486  if (minRange > 0.0f)
1487  {
1488  float mindist = minRange + sizefactor;
1489  if (distsq < mindist * mindist)
1490  return false;
1491  }
1492 
1493  float maxdist = maxRange + sizefactor;
1494  return distsq < maxdist * maxdist;
1495 }
1496 
1497 bool WorldObject::IsInRange3d(float x, float y, float z, float minRange, float maxRange) const
1498 {
1499  float dx = GetPositionX() - x;
1500  float dy = GetPositionY() - y;
1501  float dz = GetPositionZ() - z;
1502  float distsq = dx * dx + dy * dy + dz * dz;
1503 
1504  float sizefactor = GetObjectSize();
1505 
1506  // check only for real range
1507  if (minRange > 0.0f)
1508  {
1509  float mindist = minRange + sizefactor;
1510  if (distsq < mindist * mindist)
1511  return false;
1512  }
1513 
1514  float maxdist = maxRange + sizefactor;
1515  return distsq < maxdist * maxdist;
1516 }

1518 void Position::RelocateOffset(const Position& offset)
1519 {
1520  m_positionX = GetPositionX() + (offset.GetPositionX() * cos(GetOrientation()) + offset.GetPositionY() * sin(GetOrientation() + M_PI));
1521  m_positionY = GetPositionY() + (offset.GetPositionY() * cos(GetOrientation()) + offset.GetPositionX() * sin(GetOrientation()));
1522  m_positionZ = GetPositionZ() + offset.GetPositionZ();
1523  m_orientation = GetOrientation() + offset.GetOrientation();
1524 }
1525 
1526 void Position::GetPositionOffsetTo(const Position& endPos, Position& retOffset) const
1527 {
1528  float dx = endPos.GetPositionX() - GetPositionX();
1529  float dy = endPos.GetPositionY() - GetPositionY();
1530 
1531  retOffset.m_positionX = dx * cos(GetOrientation()) + dy * sin(GetOrientation());
1532  retOffset.m_positionY = dy * cos(GetOrientation()) - dx * sin(GetOrientation());
1533  retOffset.m_positionZ = endPos.GetPositionZ() - GetPositionZ();
1534  retOffset.m_orientation = endPos.GetOrientation() - GetOrientation();
1535 }

1540  return 0;
1541 
1542  return GetAngle(obj->GetPositionX(), obj->GetPositionY());
1543 }

1546 float Position::GetAngle(const float x, const float y) const
1547 {
1548  return getAngle(GetPositionX(), GetPositionY(), x, y);

1550 
1551 void Position::GetSinCos(const float x, const float y, float& vsin, float& vcos) const
1552 {
1553  float dx = GetPositionX() - x;
1554  float dy = GetPositionY() - y;
1555 
1556  if (fabs(dx) < 0.001f && fabs(dy) < 0.001f)
1557  {
1558  float angle = (float)rand_norm() * static_cast<float>(2 * M_PI);
1559  vcos = cos(angle);
1560  vsin = sin(angle);
1561  }
1562  else
1563  {
1564  float dist = sqrt((dx * dx) + (dy * dy));
1565  vcos = dx / dist;
1566  vsin = dy / dist;
1567  }
1568 }
1569 
1570 bool Position::IsWithinBox(const Position& center, float xradius, float yradius, float zradius) const
1571 {
1572  // rotate the WorldObject position instead of rotating the whole cube, that way we can make a simplified
1573  // is-in-cube check and we have to calculate only one point instead of 4
1574 
1575  // 2PI = 360*, keep in mind that ingame orientation is counter-clockwise
1576  double rotation = 2 * M_PI - center.GetOrientation();
1577  double sinVal = std::sin(rotation);
1578  double cosVal = std::cos(rotation);
1579 
1580  float BoxDistX = GetPositionX() - center.GetPositionX();
1581  float BoxDistY = GetPositionY() - center.GetPositionY();
1582 
1583  float rotX = float(center.GetPositionX() + BoxDistX * cosVal - BoxDistY * sinVal);
1584  float rotY = float(center.GetPositionY() + BoxDistY * cosVal + BoxDistX * sinVal);
1585 
1586  // box edges are parallel to coordiante axis, so we can treat every dimension independently :D
1587  float dz = GetPositionZ() - center.GetPositionZ();
1588  float dx = rotX - center.GetPositionX();
1589  float dy = rotY - center.GetPositionY();
1590  if ((std::fabs(dx) > xradius) ||
1591  (std::fabs(dy) > yradius) ||
1592  (std::fabs(dz) > zradius))
1593  {
1594  return false;
1595  }
1596  return true;
1597 }
1598 
1599 bool Position::HasInArc(float arc, const Position* obj, float targetRadius) const
1600 {
1601  // always have self in arc
1602  if (obj == this)
1603  return true;
1604 
1605  // move arc to range 0.. 2*pi
1606  arc = Position::NormalizeOrientation(arc);
1607 
1608  float angle = GetAngle(obj);
1609  angle -= m_orientation;
1610 
1611  // move angle to range -pi ... +pi
1612  angle = Position::NormalizeOrientation(angle);
1613  if (angle > M_PI)
1614  angle -= 2.0f * M_PI;
1615 
1616  float lborder = -1 * (arc / 2.0f); // in range -pi..0
1617  float rborder = (arc / 2.0f); // in range 0..pi
1618 
1619  // pussywizard: take into consideration target size
1620  if (targetRadius > 0.0f)
1621  {
1622  float distSq = GetExactDist2dSq(obj);
1623  // pussywizard: at least a part of target's model is in every direction
1624  if (distSq < targetRadius * targetRadius)
1625  return true;
1626  float angularRadius = 2.0f * atan(targetRadius / (2.0f * sqrt(distSq)));
1627  lborder -= angularRadius;
1628  rborder += angularRadius;
1629  }
1630 
1631  return ((angle >= lborder) && (angle <= rborder));
1632 }
1633 
1634 bool WorldObject::IsInBetween(const WorldObject* obj1, const WorldObject* obj2, float size) const
1635 {
1636  if (!obj1 || !obj2)
1637  return false;
1638 
1639  if (!size)
1640  size = GetObjectSize() / 2;
1641 
1642  float pdist = obj1->GetExactDist2dSq(obj2) + size / 2.0f;
1643  if (GetExactDist2dSq(obj1) >= pdist || GetExactDist2dSq(obj2) >= pdist)
1644  return false;
1645 
1646  if (G3D::fuzzyEq(obj1->GetPositionX(), obj2->GetPositionX()))
1647  return GetPositionX() >= obj1->GetPositionX() - size && GetPositionX() <= obj1->GetPositionX() + size;
1648 
1649  float A = (obj2->GetPositionY() - obj1->GetPositionY()) / (obj2->GetPositionX() - obj1->GetPositionX());
1650  float B = -1;
1651  float C = obj1->GetPositionY() - A * obj1->GetPositionX();
1652  float dist = fabs(A * GetPositionX() + B * GetPositionY() + C) / sqrt(A * A + B * B);
1653  return dist <= size;
1654 }
1655 
1656 bool WorldObject::isInFront(WorldObject const* target, float arc) const
1657 {
1658  return HasInArc(arc, target);
1659 }
1660 
1661 bool WorldObject::isInBack(WorldObject const* target, float arc) const
1662 {
1663  return !HasInArc(2 * M_PI - arc, target);
1664 }

1666 void WorldObject::GetRandomPoint(const Position& pos, float distance, float& rand_x, float& rand_y, float& rand_z) const
1667 {
1668  if (!distance)
1669  {
1670  pos.GetPosition(rand_x, rand_y, rand_z);
1671  return;
1672  }
1673 
1674  // angle to face `obj` to `this`
1675  float angle = (float)rand_norm() * static_cast<float>(2 * M_PI);
1676  float new_dist = (float)rand_norm() * static_cast<float>(distance);
1677 
1678  rand_x = pos.m_positionX + new_dist * cos(angle);
1679  rand_y = pos.m_positionY + new_dist * sin(angle);
1680  rand_z = pos.m_positionZ;
1681 
1682  Acore::NormalizeMapCoord(rand_x);
1683  Acore::NormalizeMapCoord(rand_y);
1684  UpdateGroundPositionZ(rand_x, rand_y, rand_z); // update to LOS height if available
1685 }
1686 
1687 Position WorldObject::GetRandomPoint(const Position& srcPos, float distance) const
1688 {
1689  float x, y, z;
1690  GetRandomPoint(srcPos, distance, x, y, z);
1691  return Position(x, y, z, GetOrientation());
1692 }

1694 void WorldObject::UpdateGroundPositionZ(float x, float y, float &z) const
1695 {
1696  float new_z = GetMapHeight(x, y, z);
1697  if (new_z > INVALID_HEIGHT)
1698  z = new_z + (isType(TYPEMASK_UNIT) ? static_cast<Unit const*>(this)->GetHoverHeight() : 0.0f);
1699 }
1700 
1707 float WorldObject::GetMinHeightInWater() const
1708 {
1709  // have a fun with Archimedes' formula
1710  auto height = GetCollisionHeight();
1711  auto width = GetCollisionWidth();
1712  auto weight = getWeight(height, width, 1040); // avg human specific weight
1713  auto heightOutOfWater = getOutOfWater(width, weight, 10202) * 4.0f; // avg human density
1714  auto heightInWater = height - heightOutOfWater;
1715  return (height > heightInWater ? heightInWater : (height - (height / 3)));
1716 }
1717 
1718 void WorldObject::UpdateAllowedPositionZ(float x, float y, float& z, float* groundZ) const
1719 {
1720  if (GetTransport())
1721  {
1722  if (groundZ)
1723  *groundZ = z;
1724 
1725  return;
1726  }
1727 
1728  if (Unit const* unit = ToUnit())
1729  {
1730  if (!unit->CanFly())
1731  {
1732  Creature const* c = unit->ToCreature();
1733  bool canSwim = c ? c->CanSwim() : true;
1734  float ground_z = z;
1735  float max_z;
1736  if (canSwim)
1737  max_z = GetMapWaterOrGroundLevel(x, y, z, &ground_z);
1738  else
1739  max_z = ground_z = GetMapHeight(x, y, z);
1740 
1741  if (max_z > INVALID_HEIGHT)
1742  {
1743  if (canSwim && unit->GetMap()->IsInWater(unit->GetPhaseMask(), x, y, max_z - Z_OFFSET_FIND_HEIGHT, unit->GetCollisionHeight()))
1744  {
1745  // do not allow creatures to walk on
1746  // water level while swimming
1747  max_z = std::max(max_z - GetMinHeightInWater(), ground_z);
1748  }
1749  else
1750  {
1751  // hovering units cannot go below their hover height
1752  float hoverOffset = unit->GetHoverHeight();
1753  max_z += hoverOffset;
1754  ground_z += hoverOffset;
1755  }
1756 
1757  if (z > max_z)
1758  z = max_z;
1759  else if (z < ground_z)
1760  z = ground_z;
1761  }
1762 
1763  if (groundZ)
1764  *groundZ = ground_z;
1765  }
1766  else
1767  {
1768  float ground_z = GetMapHeight(x, y, z) + unit->GetHoverHeight();
1769  if (z < ground_z)
1770  z = ground_z;
1771 
1772  if (groundZ)
1773  *groundZ = ground_z;
1774  }
1775  }
1776  else
1777  {
1778  float ground_z = GetMapHeight(x, y, z);
1779  if (ground_z > INVALID_HEIGHT)
1780  z = ground_z;
1781 
1782  if (groundZ)
1783  *groundZ = ground_z;
1784  }
1785 }

1788 {
1789  return Acore::IsValidMapCoord(m_positionX, m_positionY, m_positionZ, m_orientation);
1790 }

1792 float WorldObject::GetGridActivationRange() const
1793 {
1794  if (ToPlayer())
1795  {
1796  if (ToPlayer()->IsOnCinematic())
1797  {

1799  }
1800  return IsInWintergrasp() ? VISIBILITY_DIST_WINTERGRASP : GetMap()->GetVisibilityRange();
1801  }

1803  {
1804  return ToCreature()->m_SightDistance;
1805  }
1806  else if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_GAMEOBJECT && ToGameObject()->IsTransport() && isActiveObject())
1807  {
1808  return GetMap()->GetVisibilityRange();
1809  }
1810 
1811  return 0.0f;

1814 float WorldObject::GetVisibilityRange() const
1815 {

1818  else if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_GAMEOBJECT)

1822  else if (IsVisibilityOverridden())
1823  return MAX_VISIBILITY_DISTANCE;
1824  else
1825  return GetMap()->GetVisibilityRange() + VISIBILITY_INC_FOR_GOBJECTS;

1831 float WorldObject::GetSightRange(const WorldObject* target) const
1832 {
1833  if (ToUnit())
1834  {
1835  if (ToPlayer())
1836  {
1837  if (target)
1838  {
1839  if (target->IsVisibilityOverridden() && target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
1840  {
1841  return MAX_VISIBILITY_DISTANCE;
1842  }
1843  else if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_GAMEOBJECT)
1844  {
1845  if (IsInWintergrasp() && target->IsInWintergrasp())
1846  {
1847  return VISIBILITY_DIST_WINTERGRASP + VISIBILITY_INC_FOR_GOBJECTS;
1848  }
1849  else if (target->IsVisibilityOverridden())
1850  {
1851  return MAX_VISIBILITY_DISTANCE;
1852  }
1853  else if (ToPlayer()->IsOnCinematic())
1854  {
1855  return DEFAULT_VISIBILITY_INSTANCE;
1856  }
1857  else
1858  {
1859  return GetMap()->GetVisibilityRange() + VISIBILITY_INC_FOR_GOBJECTS;
1860  }
1861  }
1862 
1863  return IsInWintergrasp() && target->IsInWintergrasp() ? VISIBILITY_DIST_WINTERGRASP : GetMap()->GetVisibilityRange();
1864  }
1865  return IsInWintergrasp() ? VISIBILITY_DIST_WINTERGRASP : GetMap()->GetVisibilityRange();
1866  }
1867  else if (ToCreature())
1868  {
1869  return ToCreature()->m_SightDistance;
1870  }
1871  else
1872  {
1873  return SIGHT_RANGE_UNIT;
1874  }
1875  }
1876 
1877  if (ToDynObject() && isActiveObject())
1878  {
1879  return GetMap()->GetVisibilityRange();
1880  }
1881 
1882  return 0.0f;
1883 }
1884 
1885 bool WorldObject::CanSeeOrDetect(WorldObject const* obj, bool ignoreStealth, bool distanceCheck, bool checkAlert) const
1886 {
1887  if (this == obj)
1888  return true;
1889 
1890  if (obj->IsNeverVisible() || CanNeverSee(obj))
1891  return false;
1892 
1893  if (obj->IsAlwaysVisibleFor(this) || CanAlwaysSee(obj))
1894  return true;
1895 
1896  // Creature scripts
1897  if (Creature const* cObj = obj->ToCreature())
1898  if (cObj->IsAIEnabled && this->ToPlayer() && !cObj->AI()->CanBeSeen(this->ToPlayer()))
1899  return false;
1900 
1901  // Gameobject scripts
1902  if (GameObject const* goObj = obj->ToGameObject())
1903  if (this->ToPlayer() && !goObj->AI()->CanBeSeen(this->ToPlayer()))
1904  return false;
1905 
1906  // pussywizard: arena spectator
1907  if (obj->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
1908  if (((const Player*)obj)->IsSpectator() && ((const Player*)obj)->FindMap()->IsBattleArena())
1909  return false;
1910 
1911  bool corpseVisibility = false;
1912  if (distanceCheck)
1913  {
1914  bool corpseCheck = false;
1915  WorldObject const* viewpoint = this;
1916  if (Player const* thisPlayer = ToPlayer())
1917  {
1918  if (thisPlayer->isDead() && thisPlayer->GetHealth() > 0 && // Cheap way to check for ghost state
1919  !(obj->m_serverSideVisibility.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GHOST) & m_serverSideVisibility.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GHOST) & GHOST_VISIBILITY_GHOST))
1920  {
1921  if (Corpse* corpse = thisPlayer->GetCorpse())
1922  {
1923  corpseCheck = true;
1924  if (corpse->IsWithinDist(thisPlayer, GetSightRange(obj), false))
1925  if (corpse->IsWithinDist(obj, GetSightRange(obj), false))
1926  corpseVisibility = true;
1927  }
1928  }
1929 
1930  // our additional checks
1931  if (Unit const* target = obj->ToUnit())
1932  {
1933  // xinef: don't allow to detect vehicle accessory if you can't see vehicle base!
1934  if (Unit const* vehicle = target->GetVehicleBase())
1935  if (!thisPlayer->HaveAtClient(vehicle))
1936  return false;
1937 
1938  // pussywizard: during arena preparation, don't allow to detect pets if can't see its owner (spoils enemy arena frames)
1939  if (target->IsPet() && target->GetOwnerGUID() && target->FindMap()->IsBattleArena() && GetGUID() != target->GetOwnerGUID())
1940  if (BattlegroundMap* bgmap = target->FindMap()->ToBattlegroundMap())
1941  if (Battleground* bg = bgmap->GetBG())
1942  if (bg->GetStatus() < STATUS_IN_PROGRESS && !thisPlayer->HaveAtClient(target->GetOwnerGUID()))
1943  return false;
1944  }
1945 
1946  if (thisPlayer->GetViewpoint())
1947  viewpoint = thisPlayer->GetViewpoint();
1948 
1949  if (thisPlayer->GetFarSightDistance() && !thisPlayer->isInFront(obj))
1950  {
1951  return false;
1952  }
1953  }
1954 
1955  // Xinef: check reversely obj vs viewpoint, object could be a gameObject which overrides _IsWithinDist function to include gameobject size
1956  if (!corpseCheck && !viewpoint->IsWithinDist(obj, GetSightRange(obj), true))
1957  return false;
1958  }
1959 
1960  // GM visibility off or hidden NPC
1961  if (!obj->m_serverSideVisibility.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GM))
1962  {
1963  // Stop checking other things for GMs
1964  if (m_serverSideVisibilityDetect.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GM))
1965  return true;
1966  }
1967  else
1968  return m_serverSideVisibilityDetect.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GM) >= obj->m_serverSideVisibility.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GM);
1969 
1970  // Ghost players, Spirit Healers, and some other NPCs
1971  if (!corpseVisibility && !(obj->m_serverSideVisibility.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GHOST) & m_serverSideVisibilityDetect.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GHOST)))
1972  {
1973  // Alive players can see dead players in some cases, but other objects can't do that
1974  if (Player const* thisPlayer = ToPlayer())
1975  {
1976  if (Player const* objPlayer = obj->ToPlayer())
1977  {
1978  if (thisPlayer->GetTeamId() != objPlayer->GetTeamId() || !thisPlayer->IsGroupVisibleFor(objPlayer))
1979  return false;
1980  }
1981  else
1982  return false;
1983  }
1984  else
1985  return false;
1986  }
1987 
1988  if (obj->IsInvisibleDueToDespawn())
1989  return false;
1990 
1991  // pussywizard: arena spectator
1992  if (this->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
1993  if (((const Player*)this)->IsSpectator() && ((const Player*)this)->FindMap()->IsBattleArena() && (obj->m_invisibility.GetFlags() || obj->m_stealth.GetFlags()))
1994  return false;
1995 
1996  if (!CanDetect(obj, ignoreStealth, !distanceCheck, checkAlert))
1997  return false;
1998 
1999  return true;
2000 }
2001 
2002 bool WorldObject::CanNeverSee(WorldObject const* obj) const
2003 {
2004  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && obj->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
2005  return GetMap() != obj->GetMap() || (!InSamePhase(obj) && ToUnit()->GetVehicleBase() != obj && this != obj->ToUnit()->GetVehicleBase());
2006  return GetMap() != obj->GetMap() || !InSamePhase(obj);
2007 }
2008 
2009 bool WorldObject::CanDetect(WorldObject const* obj, bool ignoreStealth, bool checkClient, bool checkAlert) const
2010 {
2011  const WorldObject* seer = this;
2012 
2013  // Pets don't have detection, they use the detection of their masters
2014  if (const Unit* thisUnit = ToUnit())
2015  if (Unit* controller = thisUnit->GetCharmerOrOwner())
2016  seer = controller;
2017 
2018  if (obj->IsAlwaysDetectableFor(seer) || GetEntry() == WORLD_TRIGGER) // xinef: World Trigger can detect all objects, used for wild gameobjects without owner!
2019  return true;
2020 
2021  if (!ignoreStealth)
2022  {
2023  if (!seer->CanDetectInvisibilityOf(obj)) // xinef: added ignoreStealth, allow AoE spells to hit invisible targets!
2024  return false;
2025 
2026  if (!seer->CanDetectStealthOf(obj, checkAlert))
2027  {
2028  // xinef: ignore units players have at client, this cant be cheated!
2029  if (checkClient)
2030  {
2031  if (GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER || !ToPlayer()->HaveAtClient(obj))
2032  return false;
2033  }
2034  else
2035  return false;
2036  }
2037  }
2038 
2039  return true;
2040 }

2042 bool WorldObject::CanDetectInvisibilityOf(WorldObject const* obj) const
2043 {
2044  uint32 mask = obj->m_invisibility.GetFlags() & m_invisibilityDetect.GetFlags();
2045  // xinef: include invisible flags of caster in the mask, 2 invisible objects should be able to detect eachother
2046  mask |= obj->m_invisibility.GetFlags() & m_invisibility.GetFlags();
2047 
2048  // Check for not detected types
2049  if (mask != obj->m_invisibility.GetFlags())
2050  return false;
2051 
2052  // It isn't possible in invisibility to detect something that can't detect the invisible object
2053  // (it's at least true for spell: 66)
2054  // It seems like that only Units are affected by this check (couldn't see arena doors with preparation invisibility)
2055  if (obj->ToUnit())
2056  {
2057  uint32 objMask = m_invisibility.GetFlags() & obj->m_invisibilityDetect.GetFlags();
2058  // xinef: include invisible flags of caster in the mask, 2 invisible objects should be able to detect eachother
2059  objMask |= m_invisibility.GetFlags() & obj->m_invisibility.GetFlags();
2060  if (objMask != m_invisibility.GetFlags())
2061  return false;
2062  }
2063 
2064  for (uint32 i = 0; i < TOTAL_INVISIBILITY_TYPES; ++i)
2065  {
2066  if (!(mask & (1 << i)))
2067  continue;
2068 
2069  // xinef: visible for the same invisibility type:
2070  if (m_invisibility.GetValue(InvisibilityType(i)) && obj->m_invisibility.GetValue(InvisibilityType(i)))
2071  continue;
2072 
2073  int32 objInvisibilityValue = obj->m_invisibility.GetValue(InvisibilityType(i));
2074  int32 ownInvisibilityDetectValue = m_invisibilityDetect.GetValue(InvisibilityType(i));
2075 
2076  // Too low value to detect
2077  if (ownInvisibilityDetectValue < objInvisibilityValue)
2078  return false;
2079  }
2080 
2081  return true;
2082 }
2083 
2084 bool WorldObject::CanDetectStealthOf(WorldObject const* obj, bool checkAlert) const
2085 {
2086  // Combat reach is the minimal distance (both in front and behind),
2087  // and it is also used in the range calculation.
2088  // One stealth point increases the visibility range by 0.3 yard.
2089 
2090  if (!obj->m_stealth.GetFlags())
2091  return true;
2092 
2093  // dead players shouldnt be able to detect stealth on arenas
2094  if (isType(TYPEMASK_PLAYER))
2095  if (!ToPlayer()->IsAlive())
2096  return false;
2097 
2098  float distance = GetExactDist(obj);
2099  float combatReach = 0.0f;
2100 
2101  if (isType(TYPEMASK_UNIT))
2102  combatReach = ((Unit*)this)->GetCombatReach();
2103 
2104  if (distance < combatReach)
2105  return true;
2106 
2107  if (!HasInArc(M_PI, obj))
2108  return false;
2109 
2110  for (uint32 i = 0; i < TOTAL_STEALTH_TYPES; ++i)
2111  {
2112  if (!(obj->m_stealth.GetFlags() & (1 << i)))
2113  continue;
2114 
2115  if (isType(TYPEMASK_UNIT))
2116  if (((Unit*)this)->HasAuraTypeWithMiscvalue(SPELL_AURA_DETECT_STEALTH, i))
2117  return true;
2118 
2119  // Starting points
2120  int32 detectionValue = 30;
2121 
2122  // Level difference: 5 point / level, starting from level 1.
2123  // There may be spells for this and the starting points too, but
2124  // not in the DBCs of the client.
2125  detectionValue += int32(getLevelForTarget(obj) - 1) * 5;
2126 
2127  // Apply modifiers
2128  detectionValue += m_stealthDetect.GetValue(StealthType(i));
2129  if (obj->isType(TYPEMASK_GAMEOBJECT))
2130  {
2131  detectionValue += 30; // pussywizard: increase detection range for gameobjects (ie. traps)
2132  if (Unit* owner = ((GameObject*)obj)->GetOwner())
2133  detectionValue -= int32(owner->getLevelForTarget(this) - 1) * 5;
2134  }
2135 
2136  detectionValue -= obj->m_stealth.GetValue(StealthType(i));
2137 
2138  // Calculate max distance
2139  float visibilityRange = float(detectionValue) * 0.3f + combatReach;
2140 
2141  Unit const* unit = ToUnit();
2142 
2143  // If this unit is an NPC then player detect range doesn't apply
2144  if (unit && unit->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && visibilityRange > MAX_PLAYER_STEALTH_DETECT_RANGE)
2145  visibilityRange = MAX_PLAYER_STEALTH_DETECT_RANGE;
2146 
2147  if (checkAlert)
2148  visibilityRange += (visibilityRange * 0.08f) + 1.5f;
2149 
2150  Unit const* targetUnit = obj->ToUnit();
2151 
2152  // If checking for alert, and creature's visibility range is greater than aggro distance, No alert
2153  if (checkAlert && unit && unit->ToCreature() && visibilityRange >= unit->ToCreature()->GetAttackDistance(targetUnit) + unit->ToCreature()->m_CombatDistance)
2154  return false;
2155 
2156  if (distance > visibilityRange)
2157  return false;
2158  }
2159 
2160  return true;
2161 }

2260 TempSummon* Map::SummonCreature(uint32 entry, Position const& pos, SummonPropertiesEntry const* properties /*= nullptr*/, uint32 duration /*= 0*/, Unit* summoner /*= nullptr*/, uint32 spellId /*= 0*/, uint32 vehId /*= 0*/)
2261 {
2262  uint32 mask = UNIT_MASK_SUMMON;
2263  if (properties)

2266  {

2272  break;

2294  break;
2295  case SUMMON_TYPE_MINIPET:
2296  case SUMMON_TYPE_JEEVES:
2297  mask = UNIT_MASK_MINION;
2298  break;
2299  default:
2300  if (properties->Flags & 512) // Mirror Image, Summon Gargoyle
2301  mask = UNIT_MASK_GUARDIAN;
2302  break;

2304  break;
2305  }

2307  return nullptr;
2308  }
2309  }
2310

2312  if (summoner)
2313  phase = summoner->GetPhaseMask();

2316  switch (mask)
2317  {
2318  case UNIT_MASK_SUMMON:
2319  summon = new TempSummon(properties, summoner ? summoner->GetGUID() : ObjectGuid::Empty, false);
2320  break;
2321  case UNIT_MASK_GUARDIAN:
2322  summon = new Guardian(properties, summoner ? summoner->GetGUID() : ObjectGuid::Empty, false);
2323  break;
2324  case UNIT_MASK_PUPPET:
2325  summon = new Puppet(properties, summoner ? summoner->GetGUID() : ObjectGuid::Empty);
2326  break;

2328  summon = new Totem(properties, summoner ? summoner->GetGUID() : ObjectGuid::Empty);
2329  break;
2330  case UNIT_MASK_MINION:
2331  summon = new Minion(properties, summoner ? summoner->GetGUID() : ObjectGuid::Empty, false);
2332  break;
2333  default:
2334  return nullptr;
2335  }
2336 
2337  EnsureGridLoaded(Cell(pos.GetPositionX(), pos.GetPositionY()));
2338  if (!summon->Create(GenerateLowGuid<HighGuid::Unit>(), this, phase, entry, vehId, pos.GetPositionX(), pos.GetPositionY(), pos.GetPositionZ(), pos.GetOrientation()))
2339  {
2340  delete summon;
2341  return nullptr;
2342  }
2343

2345

2347 
2348  summon->InitStats(duration);
2349  AddToMap(summon->ToCreature(), summon->GetOwnerGUID().IsPlayer() || (summoner && summoner->GetTransport()));

2635  if (!i_object.IsInRange2d(x, y, i_selector.m_dist - i_selector.m_size, i_selector.m_dist + i_selector.m_size))
2636  return;
2637 
2638  float angle = i_object.GetAngle(u)-i_angle;
2639 
2640  // move angle to range -pi ... +pi
2641  while (angle > M_PI)
2642  angle -= 2.0f * M_PI;
2643  while (angle < -M_PI)
2644  angle += 2.0f * M_PI;
2645 
2646  // dist include size of u
2647  float dist2d = i_object.GetDistance2d(x, y);
2648  i_selector.AddUsedPos(u->GetObjectSize(), angle, dist2d + i_object.GetObjectSize());
2649  }
2650  private:
2651  WorldObject const& i_object;
2652  WorldObject const* i_searcher;
2653  float i_angle;
2654  ObjectPosSelector& i_selector;
2655  };
2656 } // namespace Acore
2657 */
2658

2660 
2661 void WorldObject::GetNearPoint2D(WorldObject const* searcher, float& x, float& y, float distance2d, float absAngle, Position const* startPos) const
2662 {
2663  float effectiveReach = GetCombatReach();
2664 
2665  if (searcher)
2666  {
2667  effectiveReach += searcher->GetCombatReach();
2668 
2669  if (this != searcher)
2670  {
2671  float myHover = 0.0f, searcherHover = 0.0f;
2672  if (Unit const* unit = ToUnit())
2673  myHover = unit->GetHoverHeight();
2674  if (Unit const* searchUnit = searcher->ToUnit())
2675  searcherHover = searchUnit->GetHoverHeight();
2676 
2677  float hoverDelta = myHover - searcherHover;
2678  if (hoverDelta != 0.0f)
2679  effectiveReach = std::sqrt(std::max(effectiveReach * effectiveReach - hoverDelta * hoverDelta, 0.0f));
2680  }
2681  }
2682 
2683  float positionX = startPos ? startPos->GetPositionX() : GetPositionX();
2684  float positionY = startPos ? startPos->GetPositionY() : GetPositionY();
2685 
2686  x = positionX + (effectiveReach + distance2d) * std::cos(absAngle);
2687  y = positionY + (effectiveReach + distance2d) * std::sin(absAngle);
2688 
2689  Acore::NormalizeMapCoord(x);
2690  Acore::NormalizeMapCoord(y);
2691 }
2692 
2693 void WorldObject::GetNearPoint2D(float& x, float& y, float distance2d, float absAngle, Position const* startPos) const
2694 {
2695  GetNearPoint2D(nullptr, x, y, distance2d, absAngle, startPos);
2696 }
2697 
2698 void WorldObject::GetNearPoint(WorldObject const* searcher, float& x, float& y, float& z, float searcher_size, float distance2d, float absAngle, float controlZ, Position const* startPos) const
2699 {
2700  GetNearPoint2D(x, y, distance2d + searcher_size, absAngle, startPos);
2701  z = GetPositionZ();
2702 
2703  if (searcher)
2704  {
2705  if (Unit const* unit = searcher->ToUnit(); Unit const* target = ToUnit())
2706  {
2707  if (unit && target && unit->IsInWater() && target->IsInWater())
2708  {
2709  // if the searcher is in water
2710  // we have no ground so we can
2711  // set the target height to the
2712  // z-coord to keep the searcher
2713  // at the correct height (face to face)
2714  z += GetCollisionHeight() - unit->GetCollisionHeight();
2715  }
2716  }
2717  searcher->UpdateAllowedPositionZ(x, y, z);
2718  }
2719  else
2720  {
2721  UpdateAllowedPositionZ(x, y, z);
2722  }
2723 
2724  // if detection disabled, return first point
2725  if (!sWorld->getBoolConfig(CONFIG_DETECT_POS_COLLISION))
2726  return;
2727 
2728  // return if the point is already in LoS
2729  if (!controlZ && IsWithinLOS(x, y, z))
2730  return;
2731 
2732  // remember first point
2733  float first_x = x;
2734  float first_y = y;
2735  float first_z = z;
2736 
2737  // loop in a circle to look for a point in LoS using small steps
2738  for (float angle = float(M_PI) / 8; angle < float(M_PI) * 2; angle += float(M_PI) / 8)
2739  {
2740  GetNearPoint2D(x, y, distance2d + searcher_size, absAngle + angle, startPos);
2741  z = GetPositionZ();
2742  UpdateAllowedPositionZ(x, y, z);
2743  if (controlZ && fabsf(GetPositionZ() - z) > controlZ)
2744  continue;
2745 
2746  if (IsWithinLOS(x, y, z))
2747  return;
2748  }
2749 
2750  // still not in LoS, give up and return first position found
2751  if (startPos)
2752  {
2753  x = searcher->GetPositionX();
2754  y = searcher->GetPositionY();
2755  z = searcher->GetPositionZ();
2756  }
2757  else
2758  {
2759  x = first_x;
2760  y = first_y;
2761  z = first_z;
2762  }
2763 }
2764 
2765 void WorldObject::GetVoidClosePoint(float& x, float& y, float& z, float size, float distance2d /*= 0*/, float relAngle /*= 0*/, float controlZ /*= 0*/) const
2766 {
2767  // angle calculated from current orientation
2768  GetNearPoint(nullptr, x, y, z, size, distance2d, GetOrientation() + relAngle, controlZ);
2769 }
2770 
2771 bool WorldObject::GetClosePoint(float& x, float& y, float& z, float size, float distance2d, float angle, const WorldObject* forWho, bool force) const
2772 {
2773  // angle calculated from current orientation
2774  GetNearPoint(forWho, x, y, z, size, distance2d, GetOrientation() + angle);
2775 
2776  if (fabs(this->GetPositionZ() - z) > 3.0f || !IsWithinLOS(x, y, z))
2777  {
2778  x = this->GetPositionX();
2779  y = this->GetPositionY();
2780  z = this->GetPositionZ();
2781  if (forWho)
2782  if (const Unit* u = forWho->ToUnit())
2783  u->UpdateAllowedPositionZ(x, y, z);
2784  }
2785  float maxDist = GetObjectSize() + size + distance2d + 1.0f;
2786  if (GetExactDistSq(x, y, z) >= maxDist * maxDist)
2787  {
2788  if (force)
2789  {
2790  x = this->GetPositionX();
2791  y = this->GetPositionY();
2792  z = this->GetPositionZ();
2793  return true;
2794  }
2795  return false;
2796  }
2797  return true;
2798 }

2848 void WorldObject::MovePosition(Position& pos, float dist, float angle)
2849 {
2850  angle += m_orientation;
2851  float destx, desty, destz, ground, floor;
2852  destx = pos.m_positionX + dist * cos(angle);
2853  desty = pos.m_positionY + dist * sin(angle);
2854 
2855  // Prevent invalid coordinates here, position is unchanged
2856  if (!Acore::IsValidMapCoord(destx, desty))
2857  {
2858  LOG_FATAL("entities.object", "WorldObject::MovePosition invalid coordinates X: %f and Y: %f were passed!", destx, desty);
2859  return;
2860  }
2861 
2862  ground = GetMapHeight(destx, desty, MAX_HEIGHT);
2863  floor = GetMapHeight(destx, desty, pos.m_positionZ);
2864  destz = fabs(ground - pos.m_positionZ) <= fabs(floor - pos.m_positionZ) ? ground : floor;
2865 
2866  float step = dist / 10.0f;
2867 
2868  for (uint8 j = 0; j < 10; ++j)
2869  {
2870  // do not allow too big z changes
2871  if (fabs(pos.m_positionZ - destz) > 6.0f)
2872  {
2873  destx -= step * cos(angle);
2874  desty -= step * sin(angle);
2875  ground = GetMapHeight(destx, desty, MAX_HEIGHT);
2876  floor = GetMapHeight(destx, desty, pos.m_positionZ);
2877  destz = fabs(ground - pos.m_positionZ) <= fabs(floor - pos.m_positionZ) ? ground : floor;
2878  }
2879  // we have correct destz now
2880  else
2881  {
2882  pos.Relocate(destx, desty, destz);
2883  break;
2884  }
2885  }
2886 
2887  Acore::NormalizeMapCoord(pos.m_positionX);
2888  Acore::NormalizeMapCoord(pos.m_positionY);
2889  UpdateGroundPositionZ(pos.m_positionX, pos.m_positionY, pos.m_positionZ);
2890  pos.m_orientation = m_orientation;
2891 }
2892 
2893 Position WorldObject::GetFirstCollisionPosition(float startX, float startY, float startZ, float destX, float destY)
2894 {
2895  auto dx = destX - startX;
2896  auto dy = destY - startY;
2897 
2898  auto ang = atan2(dy, dx);
2899  ang = (ang >= 0) ? ang : 2 * M_PI + ang;
2900  Position pos = Position(startX, startY, startZ, ang);
2901 
2902  auto distance = pos.GetExactDist2d(destX,destY);
2903 
2904  MovePositionToFirstCollision(pos, distance, ang);
2905  return pos;
2906 }
2907 
2908 Position WorldObject::GetFirstCollisionPosition(float destX, float destY, float destZ)
2909 {
2910  Position pos = GetPosition();

2912 
2913  auto dx = destX - pos.GetPositionX();
2914  auto dy = destY - pos.GetPositionY();
2915 
2916  auto ang = atan2(dy, dx);
2917  ang = (ang >= 0) ? ang : 2 * M_PI + ang;
2918 
2919  MovePositionToFirstCollision(pos, distance, ang);
2920  return pos;
2921 }

2930 void WorldObject::MovePositionToFirstCollision(Position& pos, float dist, float angle)
2931 {
2932  angle += GetOrientation();
2933  float destx, desty, destz;
2934  destx = pos.m_positionX + dist * cos(angle);
2935  desty = pos.m_positionY + dist * sin(angle);
2936  destz = pos.m_positionZ;
2937 
2938  if (!GetMap()->CheckCollisionAndGetValidCoords(this, pos.m_positionX, pos.m_positionY, pos.m_positionZ, destx, desty, destz, false))
2939  return;
2940 
2941  pos.SetOrientation(GetOrientation());
2942  pos.Relocate(destx, desty, destz);
2943 }

3023 void WorldObject::AddToNotify(uint16 f)
3024 {
3025  if (!(m_notifyflags & f))
3026  if (Unit* u = ToUnit())
3027  {
3028  if (f & NOTIFY_VISIBILITY_CHANGED)
3029  {
3030  uint32 EVENT_VISIBILITY_DELAY = u->FindMap() ? DynamicVisibilityMgr::GetVisibilityNotifyDelay(u->FindMap()->GetEntry()->map_type) : 1000;
3031 
3032  uint32 diff = getMSTimeDiff(u->m_last_notify_mstime, World::GetGameTimeMS());
3033  if (diff >= EVENT_VISIBILITY_DELAY / 2)
3034  EVENT_VISIBILITY_DELAY /= 2;
3035  else
3036  EVENT_VISIBILITY_DELAY -= diff;
3037  u->m_delayed_unit_relocation_timer = EVENT_VISIBILITY_DELAY;
3038  u->m_last_notify_mstime = World::GetGameTimeMS() + EVENT_VISIBILITY_DELAY - 1;
3039  }
3040  else if (f & NOTIFY_AI_RELOCATION)
3041  {
3042  u->m_delayed_unit_ai_notify_timer = u->FindMap() ? DynamicVisibilityMgr::GetAINotifyDelay(u->FindMap()->GetEntry()->map_type) : 500;
3043  }
3044 
3045  m_notifyflags |= f;
3046  }
3047 }
